summary: An ordinance relating to the establishing of elevated roadways on Alaskan Way and South Alaskan Way and other streets from the vicinity of First Avenue South and Railroad Way to the vicinity of Battery Street; for a depressed roadway on Battery Street and other streets from this point to the intersection of Aurora Avenue and Thomas Street and for approaches to said roadway; and for changing and establishing the necessary grades as contemplated by Ordinance No. 77088; and amending Sections 1, 2 and 3 of said ordinance for certain changes in alignment and in grade; and adding Section 4-A to include the taking of certain additional property in Bell's 6th Addition and in Block 324 Seattle Tide Lands.
